attributes.action: Ban buy to let from buying council/ex-council properties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As EVERYONE in this country knows we are currently facing a housing crisis.
Any low cost housing is immediately snatched up by the buy2let brigade with the sole purpose of lining their pockets rather than working for a living!
They say they restore properties,but who doesnt if buying a HOME?
Does the government want all of us on lower wages to be stuck in council/housing ass homes paying rent all our lives for rundown and VERY poorly maintained properties?
Do something NOW before this gets any worse than it already is!
